tool_description: This WebKnox web API lets you process Web pages. You can detect (publish, modified dates, language), extract (author, content, facts), and rank (using a service or rating the quality).
name: Web
title: Web

api_list.name: Rank a Web Page
api_list.description: Rank a Web page with a certain service.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The URL of the Web page that should be ranked.

required_parameters.name: service
required_parameters.description: The name of the service with which the Web page should be ranked.

api_list.name: Detect Publish Date
api_list.description: Detect the publish date of the Web page.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The URL of the Web page.

api_list.name: Rate the Quality
api_list.description: Determine the quality of an article.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The URL of the Web page which contains an article that should be rated.

api_list.name: Extract Content
api_list.description: Extract the main content of a Web page.

api_list.name: Detect Author
api_list.description: Detect the author of the article on a Web page.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The URL of the article for which the author should be extracted.

required_parameters.name: language
required_parameters.description: The language of the Web page (en=English, de=German).

api_list.name: Detect Last Modified Date
api_list.description: Detect when the page was last modified.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The URL of the Web page.

api_list.name: Detect Language
api_list.description: Detect the language of a natural language text.
